mapper.sql: office_id, office_code, office_name, parent_office_id, remarks, office_level, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT a.office_id AS officeId, a.office_code AS officeCode, a.office_name AS officeName, a.parent_office_id AS parentOfficeId, a.office_level AS officeLevel, a.remarks AS remarks, a.create_user AS createUser, a.create_time AS createTime, a.update_user AS updateUser, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.del_flag AS delFlag FROM sys_office a WHERE a.del_flag = #{delFlag} AND a.office_id = #{officeId}

SELECT office_id AS officeId, office_code AS officeCode, office_name AS officeName, parent_office_id AS parentOfficeId, office_level AS officeLevel, remarks AS remarks, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime, del_flag AS delFlag FROM sys_office a WHERE 1=1 AND a.del_flag = #{delFlag} ORDER BY a.office_code ASC
mapper.insert: insert into sys_office (office_id, office_code, office_name, parent_office_id, office_level, remarks, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, del_flag) values (#{officeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentOfficeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officeLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sys_office
office_code = #{officeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
office_name = #{officeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_office_id = #{parentOfficeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
office_level = #{officeLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where office_id = #{officeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_office set office_code = #{officeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, office_name = #{officeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_office_id = #{parentOfficeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, office_level = #{officeLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where office_id = #{officeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
